title: Automate social media posts with AI content and images across Twitter, LinkedIn & Facebook
description:
## Auto-generate & post content using AI

This workflow helps you create daily content using just a topic prompt. It writes a tweet, generates an image, and publishes across Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn ‚Äî all on autopilot.

---

### How it works

- Triggers daily at 10 PM to start the flow  
- Uses OpenAI to generate a niche topic title  
- Writes a short-form post (tweet style) with hashtags  
- Generates a Japanese anime-style image for visual context  
- Saves everything in Google Sheets  
- Publishes automatically on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook  

---

### Set up steps

- You‚Äôll need OpenAI, Google Sheets, and social media credentials (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn)  
- Takes about **10‚Äì15 minutes** to configure if you already have the credentials ready  
- Make sure your Sheet and API keys are properly linked before activating  

üìù Keep detailed notes inside the workflow with sticky notes for easier handoff or collaboration.
